video.title: Star-Crossed
video.synopsis: The passionate love between an alien boy and a human girl grows more and more dangerous as they face the wrath of their families and communities.

episodes.synopsis: Love ignites between a human girl and an alien boy when he and others of his kind living in an internment camp are integrated into a suburban school.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Emery tries to persuade the school board to overturn their vote, blocking Atrians from attending homecoming; Roman steps up to lead the Atrians.
episodes.title: These Violent Delights Have Violent Ends

episodes.synopsis: On the anniversary of the Atrian arrival, human students are chosen to experience the Sector; the side effects of cyper threaten Julia's life.
episodes.title: Out Toil Shall Strive To Mend

episodes.synopsis: Roman obtains Nox's illegal cell phone and tries to protect Nox while getting the data; Sophia enters a swim meet that could cost her her life.
episodes.title: And Left No Friendly Drop

episodes.synopsis: Eric is accused of hate crimes perpetrated by rogue Red Hawks; Gloria shadows Roman as he follows a lead to Eljida, a mythic hidden place for Atrians.
episodes.title: Dreamers Often Lie

episodes.synopsis: Emery throws a gossip blogger off her trail by offering information about the Red Hawks; at a fundraiser, Grayson becomes the target of kidnappers.
episodes.title: Stabbed With A White Wench's Black Eye

episodes.synopsis: When Lukas inhales black cyper spores, Emery and Roman must track down the cyper to save Lukas and destroy it before the Trags use it to kill humans.
episodes.title: To Seek A Foe

episodes.synopsis: A secret romance begins when Roman invites Emery to the feast of Dinaskyu; Emery finds evidence of a murder that led to the Atrian ship's crash.
episodes.title: An Old Accustom'd Feast

episodes.synopsis: Roman confronts Castor about his role in crashing the Atrian ship and is taken captive; Grayson blackmails Drake for information and more.
episodes.title: Some Consequence Yet Hanging In The Stars

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious hurricane descends upon Edendale, trapping the students and the Atrian Seven inside the school; Teri embarks on a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: What Storm Is This That Blows So

episodes.synopsis: Sophia's attempt to confirm suspicions about Taylor puts Emery in peril;  Roman risks his life when he and Castor testify about the ship's crash.
episodes.title: Give Me A Torch

episodes.synopsis: Finding that the Suvek survived their attack, Roman and Drake enlist their crew to smuggle it out of the sector; Castor and Roman have a lethal clash.
episodes.title: This Trick May Chance To Scathe You

episodes.synopsis: Emery must reach out to Teri in order to save Roman's life; Vega orders a hit on Teri's friends in order to protect her plans for the Suvek.
episodes.title: Passion Lends Them Power
